title: Proposed Schema for the DDoS Info Sharing Project, for the output of the data distribution service.

SourceName.description: The name of the organization of the user requesting data.

IPaddress.description: The source of the DDoS attack packets.

numberOfTimesSeen.description: The number of times that the IP address has been reported to CRITs by one or more ISPs.

numberOfReporters.description: The number of ISPs who have reported to this IP address (and whose data on this IP hasn't expired).

City.description: The location of the IP Address based on geo IP info.

State.description: The location of the IP Address based on geo IP info.

Country.description: The country associated with the IP Address, formatted as an ISO alpha-2 code.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the IP address based on geo IP info.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the IP address based on geo IP info.

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 formatted time stamp at which this particular event started.

attackTypes.description: The type(s) of attack(s) at the time of this event.

totalBytesSent.description: The total volume of traffic, measured in bytes.

totalPacketsSent.description: The total volume of traffic, measured in packets.

peakBPS.description: The maximum traffic during this event in bytes per second.

peakPPS.description: The maximum traffic during this event in packets per second.

sourcePort.description: The source port used for the attack.

destinationPort.description: The destination port used for the attack.

protocol.description: The protocol used for the attack.
